title: Lean Six Sigma Value Chain Management
description: Familiarization with the Lean Six Sigma process improvement methodology and practice using Six Sigma Black Belt tools. A Six Sigma Black Belt is an individual skilled in applying basic and advanced process improvement and project management methods in order to complete projects that will result in significant, sustainable improvements within an organization. 2 lectures, 2 laboratories.
prerequisites: OCOB graduate standing or approval from the Associate Dean
